name: Okkto.
description:
Controls:
WASD = movement
Arrow Keys = fire
Space Bar = bomb

-------------------------------

A basic twin-stick shooter I'm playing around with. Lots more I'd like to add in terms of system/progression, but pretty happy where I landed in under 30 hours (created for the 'One Hour a Day' game jam). I did not incorporate the theme of the jam.

Please comment with any bugs/errors you run into. Sorry I didn't have time to get even close to game balancing it. The game ends currently at 'Wave 6' (or maybe it was 7??? ). Thanks for playing!

-------------------------------

Music by: Jim Hall (Synth Kid)
Thanks to:  @Jasontherand for coding help and @CoffeeSpiller for creating the jam
